message:
Dear {{ applicant_name }},

Thank you for submitting your application for the {{ applied_for_designation }} position. We’ve received your details and our recruitment team will be reviewing them shortly.

Submitted Details:

  • Email: {{ applicant_email }}
  • Phone Number: {{ phone_number }}
  • Applied For: {{ applied_for_designation }}

If any corrections are needed, feel free to reply to this email.

We appreciate your interest and will be in touch with next steps soon.

Best regards,
The HR Team
